title: Instance

A single version of 
SmartSimple
.
Each SmartSimple customer has access to two instances - one used for production use and another 
Backup and Testing Instance
 that is used for immediate backup and for testing new features.

https://wiki.smartsimple.com/index.php?title=Instance&oldid=36379
